name: rattled

effect.black_white: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage with each hit from a damaging dark-, ghost-, or bug-type move.
effect.black_2_white_2: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage with each hit from a damaging dark-, ghost-, or bug-type move.

short_effect: Raises Speed one stage upon being hit by a dark, ghost, or bug move.

flavor_text.black_white: Some move types scare it and boost its Speed.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Some move types scare it and boost its Speed.
